title: Gladiator Star Changes His Name Back
summary: Jamie Christian-Johal, who is called Giant on the TV show Gladiators, has decided to change his name back to Jamie Bigg. He was born as Jamie Bigg, but his name changed when he was young. Now, he wants to use his birth name again. Jamie is a big and strong person who eats a lot of food to stay fit. He is also in a play about Jack and the Beanstalk. He said he is making this change because he wants to be himself and not hide behind a character. He talked about this on social media to share his story with fans.
